name: Laser Hive
description:
An alien world full of lava

Survive on a floating platform with only a laser gun.

Hoverbots and Bosses

The platform is filled with dangerous hoverbots and ROBOT BOSSES! Destroy them all and survive!

Amazing Weapons

Use laser weapons to destroy the bots. The platform is filled with Laser Rifle, Laser Shotgun & Disk Launcher!
